title: United States relationship to the war

content.prompt: The point of view in the excerpt best supports which of the following historical arguments about United States involvement in the First World War before 1917 ?

choices.label: Great Britain was defending humanitarian ideals shared with the United States.
The actions of Germany promoted the democratic principles of the United States.
United States policies favorable to Great Britain undercut American neutrality.
German attacks on American ships justified a United States military response.

topic.text: 7.5: World War I - Military and Diplomacy
